resources.string: 1. Canberra is the capital of Australia.
2. The Pacific Ocean is larger then the Atlantic Ocean.
3. The Suez Canel connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
4. The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
5. The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
6. Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freashwater lake.
